Welcome to The Practical Utopian! Our mission is to identify and promote principles, values and actions that will result in a brighter future for humanity. Browse through our most recent content additions below, or visit our Explore Page when you're ready for a deeper dive into the site.

As Americans we generally believe in capitalism as a superior economic system, and are typically convinced that our country is run on capitalistic principles. But I've been wondering lately: If these things are really true, then why do so few Americans actually possess any capital?
